name: Bugatti
description: A new Bugatti costs from $1.7 million for the cheapest model, a Bugatti Veyron, to upwards of $18.7 million for a Bugatti La Voiture Noire, the current most expensive model on the market. How much does a second-hand Bugatti cost? A second-hand Bugatti Veyron 16.4 costs, at a minimum, just over $1.1 million

Product1.description: In fact, the meaning behind the Nissan name isn't so much a “meaning” at all as much as it is an abbreviation. Actually, the name originates from the holding company Nihon Sangyo (or Nippon Sangyo), created in 1928. For stock market purposes, however, the name quickly took on the abbreviation Ni-San, or Niss

Product2.description: Nissan is a Japanese automaker. The Altima is Nissan's best-selling midsize sedan, but the brand's vehicle lineup is extensive. Models include hatchbacks, pickups, and an EV.
